subject: Automobiles
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Denny Hamlin won the Showtime Southern 500 and became the first driver in 17 years to sweep a Nascar weekend at Darlington Raceway.
snippet: Denny Hamlin won the Showtime Southern 500 and became the first driver in 17 years to sweep a Nascar weekend at Darlington Raceway.
